member.name: M:Covid19LabResultsService.Controllers.AppApiController.QueryTestResult(Covid19LabResultsService.Models.TestResultRequestApiModel)
member.summary: Query the the test result for given id

member.name: P:Covid19LabResultsService.Models.LabTestResultApiModel.Id
member.summary: Hash (SHA256) of test result id (aka QR-Code, GUID) encoded as hexstring

member.name: P:Covid19LabResultsService.Models.TestResultRequestApiModel.Id
member.summary:
Hash (SHA256) of test result id (aka QR-Code, GUID) encoded as hexstring
9cdda87d-a833-4f36-bd55-98b7ff8c81f3 -> 75ab05c2a8f0da58737934b55a96f86df4609458bf6360c1de2010f5edd7fca5

member.name: P:Covid19LabResultsService.Models.TestResultResponseApiModel.TestResult
member.summary:
The test result state reported by the test lab:
Pending = 0 : The test result does not exist yet
Negative = 1 : No indication for COVID-19
Positive = 2 : The test result indicates infection with COVID-19
Invalid = 3 : The test result is invalid due to unknown reason
